name: Meadow Fawn
text_description: Meadow Fawn has the ability to restore health to other Nature type cards. Each turn, one selected Nature type card regains 5 HP.
illustration_description: A gentle fawn grazes in a field of clovers under the morning sunlight. Its eyes are full of life and vibrancy, evoking a sense of tranquility. The surrounding environment is lush with greenery, signifying its deep connection with nature.
